welcome.name: Welcome
welcome.content: # SmartOAuth Welcome to the documentation. ## About SmartOauth is the newest and easiest npm module that allows you to eaisly add oauth to your site. ## Installation NPM Command: `npm install SmartOAuth` ## Example usage Coming soon! ## Links - [Website](https://beta.smart-systems.xyz/) - [Documentation](https://docs.smart-systems.xyz) - [GitHub](https://github.com/SmartSystemsGithub/SmartOAuth) - [NPM](https://www.npmjs.com/package/smartoauth)

changelog.name: Changelog
changelog.content:
# Changelog
All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/),
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

## [Unreleased]
- Click Above to compare with unreleased features.

## [1.1.0] - 2020-09-23
### Added
- Base Features. First Release.


[Unreleased]: https://github.com/olivierlacan/keep-a-changelog/compare/v1.1.0...master
[1.1.0]: https://github.com/olivierlacan/keep-a-changelog/releases/tag/v1.1.10

classes.name: Discord
classes.description:
Discord
Represents the class for a discord-oauth.

construct.name: Discord
construct.description: Creates an instance of the DiscordOAuth Client.

params.name: Config
params.description: A JSON with the configuration for the discord oauth.

methods.name: getToken
methods.description: This function gives the ability to get a User's token. This is not to be confused with GetUser.

params.name: code
params.description: The code provided with the discord callback.

methods.name: getUserFromCode
methods.description: This functions gives the ability to get information about the user from the code.

params.name: code
params.description: The code provided with the discord callback.

returns.description: The DiscordUser class is retured which shows the users, ID, profile picture and Nitro status.

methods.name: getUserFromToken
methods.description: This functions gives the ability to get information about the user from the code.

params.name: token
params.description: The token is provided using the getToken method.

returns.description: The DiscordUser class is retured which shows the users, ID, profile picture and Nitro status.

classes.name: DiscordUser
classes.description:
DiscordUser
Represents the class for a DiscordOAuth User.

construct.name: DiscordUser
construct.description: Creates an instance of the Github-based OAuth Client.

props.name: username
props.description: username - The username of the user

props.name: discriminator
props.description: discriminator - The discriminator of the user.

props.name: bot
props.description: bot - If the user is a bot.

props.name: mfa
props.description: mfa - If the user has two factor/muti factor authentication on.

props.name: locale
props.description: locale - What language the user has set.

props.name: verified_email
props.description: verified_email - Whether the user's email has been verified

classes.name: GitHub
classes.description:
Github
Represents the class for a github-based-oauth.

construct.name: GitHub
construct.description: Creates an instance of the Github-based OAuth Client.

params.name: Config
params.description: A JSON with the configuration for the github oauth.

methods.name: getToken
methods.description: This function gives the ability to get a User's token. This is not to be confused with GetUserFromToken/GetUserFromCode.

params.name: code
params.description: The code provided with the discord callback.

methods.name: getUserFromToken
methods.description: This functions gives the ability to get information about the user from the TOKEN. You may want to use GetUserFromCode instead.

params.name: token
params.description: The code provided with the GitHub callback.

returns.description: An Object is retured which shows the username, ID, avatar and more.

methods.name: getUserFromCode
methods.description: This functions gives the ability to get information about the user from the callback CODE. You may want to use GetUserFromToken instead.

params.name: code
params.description: The code provided with the github callback.

returns.description: An Object is retured which shows the username, ID, avatr and more.

classes.name: GithubUser
classes.description:
GithubUser
Represents the class for a github-oauth User.

construct.name: GithubUser
construct.description: Creates an instance of the Github-based OAuth Client.

props.name: username
props.description: username - The username of the user

props.name: userid
props.description: userid - The id of the user

props.name: avatar
props.description: avatar - The URL to the avatar of the user

props.name: bio
props.description: bio - The bio of the user.

props.name: mfa
props.description: mfa - If the user has two factor/muti factor authentication on.

props.name: location
props.description: location - The location the user has set themselves to be shown as.

props.name: email
props.description: email - The email the user has set themselves to have.

props.name: twitter
props.description: twitter - The Twitter Username the user has set themselves to have.

props.name: plan
props.description: plan - The Github plan the user is on.

props.name: repos
props.description: repos - The repos the user owns.

props.name: gists
props.description: gists - The repos the user owns.
